headline: What Catalysts Could Shift the Narrative for Mondelez as Analyst Views Evolve?
summary: Mondelez International's consensus analyst price target has recently been revised down from $72.71 to $69.61, signaling a shift toward a more cautious outlook on the stock's fair value. This adjustment comes as analysts weigh the company's latest earnings and updated guidance, considering long-term optimism while also recognizing near-term uncertainties. Stay tuned to discover how you can track ongoing shifts in the investment narrative around Mondelez International as market conditions...

headline: Trick or treat? Halloween candy prices are frightening this year
summary: Even when it's Halloween, the scariest thing to consumers continues to be inflation! Hershey (HSY) warned of weak Halloween candy sales due to the rising costs of cocoa (CC=F). Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman outlines the growing price tags on trick-or-treaters' favorite candies over the past five years. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Falling cocoa prices offer sweet relief for chocolate stocks ahead of Halloween
summary: Cocoa prices plunge 51% in 2025 after record highs, while chocolate producers rise 14% as margins recover.
